author: April
content:
Congrats on your re-launch!

Just before your switch, I'd decided to take the plunge beginning November 1 and also opted for Wordpress. Grey Matter is my first choice for a theme (similar to this?), but then ran up against fixed vs. fluid and gallery functions as well. I envy your programming abilities, and appreciate you sharing the process with us.

Looking good.  ðŸ˜‰
